data.name: SimCasino
data.detailed_description:
Get Involved!

Join Our Discord! Chat directly with the developers and community!
Visit our workshop! Make your own slot games, tv stations, walls, floors, and more!


Please Check Out Our Upcoming Game!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2066300/Escape_The_Endless_Dogwatch/


About the Game

The Full Casino and Resort Tycoon Experience


3D graphics. Deep systems. Massive customization and creativity. Extensive mods. AND full soundtrack, from world-renowned composer Jerry Martin!

You are the Casino. Does the House Always Win?


You set the odds! Thieves, cheaters, and criminals can tilt the odds against you! Deter them with cameras and interrogation rooms! If you want to manage every last chip in the casino's vault, micro-manage the games & odds on slot machines, keep tabs on every deck of cards, or even design the ultimate high-efficiency staff schedule & security patrol scheme -- you can do all of that, and a lot more!

Workshop Support


Everything from custom pictures, floors, walls, slot machine games, TV videos, and even code! Share your casinos and mods on the workshop!

Get Creative - Customize & Design Every Aspect


This isn't a one size fits all kind of game. Build luxury hotels or cheap no-frills casinos. Choose every finish, from the walls & flooring styles, the lighting, the counter-top & bar-top materials, even the restroom stalls. After building your huge resort, walk around it with our first person mode!

Huge Number of Building Options!


- Slot Machines - Table Games - Sports Betting - Jackpot Displays
- Bingo - Theatres - Dressing Rooms - Dance Floors - Gyms
- Single & Multi-Guest Bedrooms - Luxury Rooms with Wet Bars & Hot Tubs
- Buffets - Bars - Vending Machines - Lounges
- Plants - Signs - Wall Decor - Lights & Neons - Themed Decor
- Computer Rooms - Meeting Rooms - Conference Halls
- ATMs & Cashier Cages - Security Cameras - Interrogation Rooms

data.short_description: Modern Casino Tycoon Simulation in full 3D glory. Build the casino. Set the odds. Expand into a luxury hotel/casino or go cheap & extract max profits. Keep the vault secure at all times, and beware of criminals & cheaters!!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Dutch*, Turkish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 6100 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 760 with 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: We do not recommend playing with integrated graphics or graphics card with low VRAM.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6600 or AMD Ryzen 1600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, 4 GB+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: To take full advantage of mod support, we recommend as much VRAM as possible.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.13+
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal Compatible with 4GB+
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15+
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal Compatible with 4GB+
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
